Package com.fortisbank.business.services.account

Class AccountLoanRequestService

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.business.services.account.AccountLoanRequestService
public class AccountLoanRequestService extends Object
Handles customer account opening requests and manager decisions.

      public void acceptAccountRequest(Customer customer, Account account)
      Manager accepts the request and account is created.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer whose request is accepted
      account - the account to be created

    • rejectAccountRequest

      public void rejectAccountRequest(Customer customer, String reason, Account rejectedAccount)
      Manager rejects the account request.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer whose request is rejected
      reason - the reason for rejection
      rejectedAccount - the account that was rejected
